text: He who rides the sea of the Nile must have sails woven of patience.
author: William Golding

text: Patience, that blending of moral courage with physical timidity.
author: Thomas Hardy

text: Good ideas are not adopted automatically. They must be driven into practice with courageous patience.
author: Hyman Rickover

text: Everyone ought to bear patiently the results of his own conduct.
author: Phaedrus

text: You must first have a lot of patience to learn to have patience.
author: Stanislaw Lec
